title: Virtual Assistant for AI/Tech Instagram Page
job_overview:
???? To apply, you must fill out this form:
???? Upgrade to see actual info

We’re hiring a creative and reliable virtual assistant to help grow a fast-paced Instagram brand focused on AI and tech (currently 155K+ followers). Your job will be to find the most interesting news or tools, turn them into high-quality carousel posts, and keep things organized.

Your tasks will include:

Researching trending AI/tech stories and tools

Designing 4–5 carousel posts per week in Canva

Writing short, engaging, and clear captions

Scheduling approved content in Meta Business Suite or Buffer

Tracking content ideas and post status in Airtable

You’d be a great fit if you:

Are skilled with Canva or other design tools (especially carousels)

Can write clean, natural English

Understand what performs well on Instagram

Are interested in AI, tech, and new tools

Are detail-oriented, organized, and reliable with deadlines

We’re looking to build a long-term relationship with someone creative and self-motivated.
